response.original_title: One Deadly Weekend in America: A Killing at the Carwash
response.overview: Documentary exploring the shocking levels of gun crime in America by tracking one shooting in forensic detail. Set against the backdrop of escalating gang violence in LA, director Lindsey Mace investigates the murder of 19-year-old Tavin Price, who was shot four times for wearing the wrong color shoes.
response.title: One Deadly Weekend in America: A Killing at the Carwash
